name: Option_addValueTest
description: Unit tests for the addValue method of the Option class, focusing on exception handling.

test_cases.name: testAddValue
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a value to the Option throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

test_cases.name: testAddValueAfterClearValues
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a value to the Option after clearing values throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

test_cases.name: testAddValueWithAcceptsArg
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a value to the Option when it accepts an argument throws an UnsupportedOperationException.

test_cases.name: testAddValueWithRequiresArg
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a value to the Option when it requires an argument throws an UnsupportedOperationException.
